question: hello
answer: Welcome to TechHub Support! How can I assist you with your shopping today?

question: hi
answer: Hi there! Looking for a new gadget or need help with an order?

question: what is techhub?
answer: TechHub is a premium online store for laptops, mobiles, and smart gadgets.

question: where is your store?
answer: Our main showroom is located in Ahmedabad, Gujarat, but we ship all over India.

question: store hours
answer: We are open Monday to Saturday from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM.

question: contact support
answer: You can call us at 1800-123-4567 or email support@techhub.com.

question: where is my order?
answer: You can track your order status by visiting the 'My Orders' section on our website.

question: how to track order
answer: Go to the 'Track Order' link at the top of our homepage and enter your Order ID.

question: delivery time
answer: Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days depending on your location.

question: fast delivery
answer: We offer Express Delivery (24-48 hours) for select metro cities at an extra cost.

question: international shipping
answer: Currently, we only ship within India. We plan to expand globally soon!

question: shipping cost
answer: Shipping is free for orders above ₹500. For orders below that, a flat fee of ₹50 applies.

question: payment methods
answer: We accept UPI, Credit Cards, Debit Cards, Net Banking, and Cash on Delivery (COD).

question: cod available
answer: Yes, Cash on Delivery is available for orders up to ₹10,000.

question: is it safe
answer: Yes, all payments are processed through a secure, encrypted gateway.

question: emi options
answer: Yes, we offer No-Cost EMI on major credit cards for orders above ₹5,000.

question: return policy
answer: We offer a 7-day hassle-free return policy for defective or damaged products.

question: how to return
answer: To initiate a return, go to 'My Orders' > 'Select Item' > 'Return' and state your reason.

question: refund time
answer: Refunds are processed within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned item.

question: exchange policy
answer: You can exchange a product for a different color or model within 7 days of delivery.

question: cancel order
answer: You can cancel your order before it is shipped from the 'My Orders' section.

question: laptop warranty
answer: All laptops come with a standard 1-year manufacturer warranty.

question: mobile warranty
answer: Mobile phones have a 1-year warranty on the device and 6 months on accessories.

question: extended warranty
answer: Yes, you can purchase an extended warranty plan at the checkout page.

question: refurbished items
answer: We have a separate section for 'Certified Refurbished' products with a 6-month warranty.

question: stock availability
answer: If a product is out of stock, click 'Notify Me' to get an alert when it returns.

question: reset password
answer: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page and follow the link sent to your email.

question: guest checkout
answer: Yes, you can checkout as a guest, but creating an account helps you track orders easily.

question: discount codes
answer: Check our homepage for the latest festival offers and discount coupons!
